name: Press and Jump
description:
Click and jump! What is difficult in this.

Hurricane runner from "Limed".
Your task is to jump as far as possible.
Time is getting faster, will you have time to jump as much as possible?
If you jump crookedly, you will fall down, so you need to be careful.


The game has a small selection of characters and amplifications.
Depending on the distance covered, you will be given coins.
You can spend the coins in the game store.

"Press and Jump" is a runner. Your task is to jump on the platforms. If you fall, the game will be over. If you jump well, your level will rise.
Before you start the game, you can choose a character and start playing.
